title: Tis' the Session: Everybody Dance Now Fundraiser and Jam
desc:
Everybody Dance Now! is a nonprofit organization that brings free hip hop dance classes to kids who would not have the opportunity otherwise. We value the power that movement brings and the importance of passing this gift to the next generation. Come join us in celebrating the launch of our New York chapter by uniting in dance. All proceeds from the event will go towards funding our dance programming. So come dance, battle, eat, laugh, and have a great time while making an impact! TIMETABLE? 2-4pm :? + Guest dance workshop (Instructor TBA) 4-9pm:? + DJ Doc spinning that music to make you move + 1-on-1 All Style battle + Food & drinks COST 
 ** Free for kids 16 and under** 
 Workshop alone: $20 
 Event Tickets: $20 in advance, $25 at the door 
 Workshop & event ticket combo: $30
